author: Ellen Ormesher
description:
Health organisations should cut ties with advertising agencies that work for the fossil fuel industry to protest the role of greenwashing in delaying climate action, says a group of mental health advocates. In an open letter, a dozen researchers and clinicians warned of the growing toll of despair suffered by displaced families, the disorientation and […]

The post Mental Health Professionals Join Calls For Boycott of Advertising Agencies Over Work for Polluters    appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Mental Health Professionals Join Calls For Boycott of Advertising Agencies Over Work for Polluters
